entry.title: [GRA/RBX/SBG][Collaborative solutions] - Hosted/EmailPro/Mxplan/Private Exchange maintenance notification
entry.content:
Apr 30, 22:25 UTC
Completed - The maintenance is completed, all services are operational.

Apr 21, 22:33 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 18, 13:27 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 18, 13:25 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 10, 14:14 UTC
Update - Scheduled maintenance is still in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 3, 18:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 3, 15:38 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted, Emailpro, Mxplan and Private Exchange.

Start time : 03/04/2025 18:00 UTC
End time : 30/04/2025 21:00 UTC
Service impact : None
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Hosted, Emailpro, Mxplan and Private Exchange offers by disabling TLS 1.0 and TLS 1.1.

The deprecation of TLS 1.0 and 1.1, as well as the removal of the aforementioned cipher suites, will be implemented as follows:
‚Ä¢ TLS 1.0 and 1.1 will no longer be supported on our infrastructure, and any attempts to connect using these protocols will result in a connection error.
‚Ä¢ The removed cipher suites will be replaced with the updated alternatives, which will be used for all new connections.
‚Ä¢ We recommend that all users ensure their clients and applications are configured to use TLS 1.2, and support the updated cipher suites.

Thank you for your understanding.
